title: Auto-Generate Acceptance Tests from Create Button
description: As a product manager, I want the system to automatically generate 1-3 acceptance test cards when I click "Create Acceptance Test" so that I can quickly start with structured Given-When-Then templates instead of writing from scratch.

acceptanceCriteria.given: I am viewing a user story in the details panel
acceptanceCriteria.when: I click the "Create Acceptance Test" button
acceptanceCriteria.then: a modal opens with 1-3 pre-generated acceptance test cards

acceptanceCriteria.given: the modal displays acceptance test cards
acceptanceCriteria.then: each card contains separate text inputs for Given, When, and Then statements

acceptanceCriteria.given: an acceptance test card is displayed
acceptanceCriteria.then: I can edit the Given field, When field, and Then field independently

notes: Cards should be visually distinct foam-style components. Pre-populate with placeholder text like 'Given [initial state]', 'When [action]', 'Then [expected outcome]'. Maintain existing modal save/cancel functionality.
